alert.note: Alert for Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 6:55PM CST until February 27 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Southern Lake and Southern Cook Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...Until 8 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
